<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dodge Away](/Feats.aspx?ID=6242) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 183 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=236)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6240)

**Trigger**
You are the target of a melee attack.

**Requirements**
You're aware of the attack and aren't [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58).

</column>

---

You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving if you choose. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you, you can Step after the Strike. If you're a master in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34), you can move 10 feet for this Step instead of 5 feet.
name: Dodge Away
requirement: You're aware of the attack and aren't  off-guard .
requirement_markdown: You're aware of the attack and aren't [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58).
